name: I Love Finding Birds
description:
New Friends

Take to the skies and fly with your newfound flock of feathered friends through challenging puzzles, beautiful locales, and more in I Love Finding Birds — a classic Hidden Object game that'll have your heart soaring!

My Birds

Meet and befriend 20 different birds!

Minigames

Treat yourself to over 20 exciting and new minigames!


Features!

  • 72 Total HO scenes
  • 24 chapters
  • Achievements
  • Butterfly Album
  • Includes a new minigame called Color by Pixel

Collector's Edition

  • 6 extra locations
  • 12 minigames
  • Wallpapers
  • A music player

Meet the birds that helped our ideas take flight! Check out I Love Finding Birds!
